CorentinJ/Real-Time-Voice-Cloning

real-time cloning of any voice from a few seconds of audio

Related repos

  • simple voice cloning tool with multi-language support
  • real-time zero-shot voice conversion and cloning
  • High-quality multilingual voice cloning
  • on-device text-to-speech with instant voice cloning from just a few seconds of audio
